EmailTemplate.name: Independent's Guide.IG Lead Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: New Year, New Content in The Independent's Guide
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, We've kicked off the New Year with new content in The Independent's Guide <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide>, MBO's free online library of educational content for both aspiring and experienced independent consultants. New this month:
- Top Business Consulting Frameworks <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/succeed/top-business-frameworks> (Downloadable Guide) - Seven Tips for Client Report Writing <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/succeed/seven-tips-client-report-writing> (Article) - How to Give Powerful Presentations <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/succeed/how-to-give-powerful-presentations> (Downloadable Guide) - What is a Portable Employer of Record? <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/launch/what-is-PER> (Article)
To learn more about how MBO Partners can help you plan, launch, succeed and grow your independent business, email us at info@mbopartners.com <mailto:info@mbopartners.com> or give us a call at 703-793-6000. ___________________________________ MBO Partners t: 703-793-6000 e: info@mbopartners.com <mailto:info@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
